name: Altona's Opfertag, 18. Januar 1916 LCCN2004665808 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Altona's Opfertag, 18. Januar 1916 Abstract: Poster showing a German soldier; in background, a woman surrounded by her children. Text reminds Altoners to contribute to war aid on Altona's Offering Day. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 86 x 60 cm. Notes: From: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Title from item.
